question: Is the protein ABCG2 (ATP-Binding Cassette, subfamily G, member 2, transporter) excreting uric acid?
ideal_answer:
Yes,
ABCG2 plays a central role on extra-renal uric acid excretion

snippets.text: TP-binding cassette transporter, sub-family G, member 2 (ABCG2/BCRP) is a well-studied urate transporter expressed on apical membranes in several tissues, including the intestine, liver, and kidney.
the discovery that ABCG2 plays a central role on extra-renal uric acid excretion,
